page.title: 15The Local Government
page.content: As with many of the things which make up the life in this area,the local government and the services it provides are split 3 ways.Flawborough and Thoroton are in the Rushcliffe area and the services are administered at West Bridgford.Alverton and Shelton are in the Newark area but are allied to different local councils.The whole area is on the conservative side of politics and for many years all representatives have been elected from this party.This is because most people in the area are middle class,property owning and practically all fully employed.This gives them a politically satisfied attitude towards the ruling party of the moment because the area has no industrial areas with there noise,pollution and high unemployment.
